Function Documentation

PIZGrowingArray* pizGrowingArrayNew ( long  size  ) 

Create the dynamic array.

Parameters:
size The size of memory allocated initially. In case of failure the pointer is NULL.
Returns:
A pointer to the new dynamic array.

void pizGrowingArrayFree ( PIZGrowingArray *  x  ) 

Free the dynamic array.

It is safe to pass NULL pointer.

Parameters:
x A Pointer.

void pizGrowingArrayClear ( PIZGrowingArray *  x  ) 

Clear the dynamic array.

Parameters:
x A valid pointer.

PIZError pizGrowingArrayAppend ( PIZGrowingArray *  x,
long  value 
)

Append a value to the array.

Parameters:
x A valid pointer.
value The value to append.
Returns:
An error code.
Remarks:
The memory is doubled in case of exceeding.

void pizGrowingArraySetValueAtIndex ( PIZGrowingArray *  x,
long  index,
long  value 
)

Set the value at a specified index.

Parameters:
x A valid pointer.
index The index (zero-based).
value The value.
Warning:
For efficiency the index is NOT checked ; so crash may occur with invalid indexing.

long pizGrowingArrayCount ( const PIZGrowingArray *  x  ) 

Get the number of values in the array.

Parameters:
x A valid pointer.
Returns:
The number of values.

long  index 
)

Get the value at a specified index.

Parameters:
x A valid pointer.
index The index (zero-based).
Returns:
The value.
Warning:
For efficiency the index is NOT checked ; so crash may occur with invalid indexing.

long* pizGrowingArrayPtr ( const PIZGrowingArray *  x  ) 

Retrieve the pointer to internal array.

Parameters:
x A valid pointer.
Returns:
The pointer.
Warning:
This function is provided for efficiency but it should be used carefully.

long  value 
)

Given a value, get the index of the first equal value found.

Parameters:
x A valid pointer.
value The value to find.
Returns:
The index if found, otherwise -1.

bool pizGrowingArrayContainsValue ( const PIZGrowingArray *  x,
long  value 
)

Test if the array countains the provided value.

Parameters:
x A valid pointer.
value The value to find.
Returns:
True if found, otherwise false.

PIZError pizGrowingArrayCopy ( PIZGrowingArray *  x,
const PIZGrowingArray *  toCopy 
)

Copy a dynamic array.

Parameters:
x A valid pointer.
toCopy A valid pointer to the dynamic array to be copied.
Returns:
An error code.
Remarks:
The new memory size reallocated is the memory size of the copied array in case of exceeding.

PIZError pizGrowingArrayAppendArray ( PIZGrowingArray *  x,
const PIZGrowingArray *  toAppend 
)

Append a dynamic array.

Parameters:
x A valid pointer.
toAppend A valid pointer to the dynamic array to be appended.
Returns:
An error code.
Remarks:
The new memory size reallocated is the sum of both memory sizes in case of exceeding.

PIZError pizGrowingArrayAppendPtr ( PIZGrowingArray *  x,
long  argc,
long *  argv 
)

Append a long array.

Parameters:
x A valid pointer.
argc The number of values to append.
argv The pointer to the values to append.
Remarks:
The new memory size is set according to a geometric progression of ratio 2.
